description: The lightweight yarns used in the Athletic sock line are battle tested, and the Merino Wool construction we use makes them one of the most versatile categories we knit. The lightweight no show tab Element carries the signature mesh on top of the foot for breathability and the lowest profile of a near indestructible foot. Because you shouldn’t step in lava.
name: Darn Tough Socks Element No Show Tab Lightweight Cushion Socks - Mens
